ygData.subject: Re: Shadowknights
ygData.msgSnippet: MAGIC ITEMS FOR OUR CLASS?!?! WHERE?  I MUST KNOW!!  ANY ADVANTAGE OVER THE SCUM OF THE LIGHT MUST BE EXPLOITED! You tell me where the magic is, and I will
ygData.messageBody:
MAGIC ITEMS FOR OUR CLASS?!?!

WHERE? I MUST KNOW!! ANY ADVANTAGE OVER THE SCUM OF THE LIGHT MUST
BE EXPLOITED!

You tell me where the magic is, and I will tell you of a secret pass
into Quenos city. That is valuable intel, on Rallos Zek!!!!!

~Xillith, Lady of Pain


>From: JACKiam1@...
>Reply-To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>Subject: [eq_shadowknights] Re: Shadowknights
>Date: Sat, 17 Apr 1999 06:23:23 EDT
>
>From: JACKiam1@...
>
>hehe heya all Jorval, Level 11 Human Shadowknight from Cazic Thule
here. Just
>wondered if any of ya knew about the SK magic weapons? As one of few
>Shadowknights on my server, i havnt really found anyone that knows
hehe.
>
>Also in reply to one of ya was talking about Shadowknights' power...
i
>recently had a fight with a Paladin <eg> in the freeport area... it
was very
>close, i'll give a quick battle report.
>
>He entered the Arena and i told him to hang on a sec... he was anon
but i
>coned him and he was a gamble to me (me being lev 11), i told him 1
sec again
>and summoned my pet, it fizzled so i waited a bit <eg> then summoned
him, i
>then yelled go and had my pet charge him. I hit him with siphon
strength and
>Disease cloud, then, as he was beating up on my skelie charged into
the fray.
>The battle was long but i was always on top, we were both getting
lower and
>lower but he was looking like dying sooner then me. He was hitting me
with,
>whats it called brilliant light or something? Well the spell makes
your
>screen go all black which isnt too good.. but i contined to fight
and, as i
>say, was winning. Anyway he was getting really low, i had about 2.5
bubbles
>left he had 1, i got another few big hits in, then all of a sudden,
he casts
>lay on hands! ARRg, he's back to full hps and im on like 2 bubbles.
Screw
>this i think, and calling upon Innoruuk... i hit him with harmtouch
for about
>110 hps...we battle on again, much similar to before except now tis
him with
>the upper hand. Finally as he himself is near death he gets a few
hits in, in
>a row and im knocked unconcious. He turns and battles my pet, just as
he
>kills it, i come around, i hit him for 16 and it was looking like
whoever got
>the next hit in would win... alas it was he <g>
>
>All in all though a brilliant fight. And when i found out he was
level 13,
>two levels above me, i was well chuffed :)
>
>
>btw nice one on whoever set up the mailing list, hope to hear from
more SKs
>soon!
>
>Jorval
>
